pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cluster-Preserving Multivariate Joint Grid Discretization // Discretize multivariate continuous data using a grid that captures the joint distribution via preserving clusters in the original data (Wang et al 2020) doi:10.1145/3388440.3412415. Joint grid discretization is applicable as a data transformation step to prepare data for model-free inference of association, function, or causality.
